family_to_description.Bitebit: Bitebit may look cuddly, but don't be fooled by its charm - those aren't paper hands... they're DIAMOND CLAWS!
family_to_description.Dipking: Dipking is bursting with personality and magical power, but handle with care - all that pent up energy may have EXPLOSIVE results!
family_to_description.Dinobit: Dinobit is big, strong and tough, but careful of that temper - Make it mad and watch out for a charge that can PLOW THROUGH EVERYTHING in its path!
family_to_description.Shiba: Shiba Ignite is always ready to jump into the heat of battle, but while it may not be the fastest - a helping paw is always there to DEFEND ITS ALLIES.
family_to_description.Zzoo: Zzoo has a big beak and a bad attitude, but if it's on your side, both can be an asset - SWIFT STRIKES make its mean streak your advantage!
family_to_description.Blockchoy: Block Choy may look tasty, but its real gift is far more delicious - a menu of healing powers is standing by to RE-FUEL its allies.
family_to_description.Number9: Number 9 is a solid choice despite appearances, but remember - it has to FLY THROUGH ENEMIES before it can attack them.
family_to_description.Axobubble: Axobubble is a born defender, but its magic is sneaky - buffs, curses and other mischief are sure to bubble up to HELP THE TEAM.
family_to_description.Unika: Unika is cool under pressure, but don't let its delicate appearance confuse you - it's ready with an ICE COLD STRIKE!
family_to_description.Chocomint: Chocomints are born with a remnant of their shells on their heads. To pass into adulthood, a joust between two young Chocomints takes place. The victor is the one who cracks its shell to unveil its cherry.
